explanation: This is a balanced Wheatstone bridge of capacitors. The central capacitor is effectively open. The circuit becomes two series pairs in parallel. <katex>$(1 \text{ series } 1) = 0.5$</katex>. <katex>$0.5 + 0.5 = 1 \mu F$</katex>.
